short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect customer feedback from any page. Best for product, sales, customer success, and customer support teams.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Collect customer feedback without the need to go to the ProdCamp app. Best for product management, sales, customer success, and customer support teams.

Chrome extension is just one among many customer feedback channels that can push customer feedback to ProdCamp. Other channels are: email forward, feature voting portal, public roadmap, feedback widget, NPS widget, Intercom messanger, API, and other.

How it works:
- Collect customer feedback
- Analyze feedback and attach it to features
- Prioritize features (with RICE framework, or feature count/effort matrix)
- Send features to Jira or GitLab to get the work done.
- Once a feature was shipped, close the feedback loop and automatically notify customers.

Build better products by prioritizing customer needs and placing them at the forefront of every decision.
